name: Harold HERRSCHAFT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Herrschaft v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 11th day of June, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

825 A.2d 1236
Harold HERRSCHAFT, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee.
